member.name: M:Upida.IMapper.MapTo``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: If implementd, recursively copies fields from the incoming domain object to the persistent dsestination object. Must be called on incoming data for updates.
member.param: incoming source object must be Dtobase derived
persistent dets object must be Dtobase derived

member.name: M:Upida.IMapper.MapToCollection``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: If implementd, recursively copies fields from incoming collection of domain objects to the persistent collection. Must be called on incoming data for updates.
member.param: Type of the source and dest object

member.name: M:Upida.IMapper.Map``1(``0)
member.summary: If implementd, recursively goes through fields of incoming domain object and assigns (back-references) parents to nested objects. Must be called before on incoming data for inserts.

member.name: M:Upida.IMapper.FilterList``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0},System.Byte)
member.summary: If implementd, recursively copies data from the incoming domain object list to the outgoing one, taking serialization levels into account. If a property does not conform to the requested serialization level - it will be assigned NULL. Must be called before sending data to client.

member.name: M:Upida.IMapper.Filter``1(``0,System.Byte)
member.summary: If implementd, recursively copies data from the incoming domain object to the outgoing one, taking serialization levels into account. If a property does not conform to the requested serialization level - it will be assigned NULL. Must be called before sending data to client.

member.summary: Creates instance of the DtoAttribute class

member.summary: Creates instance of the DtoAttribute class

member.name: M:Upida.DtoAttribute.#ctor(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Creates instance of the DtoAttribute class

member.name: P:Upida.DtoAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets value that represents serialization level, applied to current property

member.name: P:Upida.DtoAttribute.Nested
member.summary: Gets or sets value that represents serialization level, applied to child properties. Used only when decorated property is DTO class

member.name: P:Upida.DtoAttribute.IsCustomType
member.summary: Gets or sets value that tells if decorated property is custom Hibernate type

member.name: P:Upida.DtoAttribute.Parser
member.summary: Gets or sets value that represents parser object, used to parse this property from text

member.name: P:Upida.DtoAttribute.Dynamic
member.summary: Gets or sets value that indicates if nested serialization level is resolved dynamically. Nested level can be dynamic if you are trying to serialize parent object using some level higher than the level indicated in the DtoAttribute.Value. In this case the nested level is calculated at runtime based on difference between the required level and the DtoAttribute.Value. This difference is added to the DtoAttribute.Nested serialization level. This behaviour works only if Dynamic property is true.

member.summary: Sets current index (used for indexed properties). For ex. current target is 'Children' and index is '7' and field 'Name' - failure would have path this path - 'children[7].name'.

member.summary: Sets current field (property) name

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.IUpidaValidationContext.AddNested
member.summary: Propogates current field to path. For ex. if current field is 'User', call AddNested(), then call SetField("Name", null) - the failure path would be - User.Name. Usually after AddNested() call, SetTarget() must be called as well.

member.name: T:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext
member.summary: Represents basic set of validation routines

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes new instance of the ValidationContext class

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.SetTarget(Upida.Dtobase)
member.summary: Sets current target object

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.SetIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets current index (used for indexed properties). For ex. current target is 'Children' and index is '7' and field 'Name' - failure would have path this path - 'children[7].name'.

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.SetField(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets current field (property) name

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.AddNested
member.summary: Propogates current field to path. For ex. if current field is 'User', call AddNested(), then call SetField("Name", null) - the failure path would be - User.Name. Usually after AddNested() call, SetTarget() must be called as well.

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.RemoveNested
member.summary: Goes on—É node back in path.

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.FailRoot(System.String)
member.summary: Register failure without path

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.Fail(System.String)
member.summary: Register failure using current path

member.name: M:Upida.Validation.Impl.UpidaValidationContext.Fail(Upida.Validation.Failure)
member.summary: Register failure
